description: Will Clark and studly bald Tony Scalia are slowly and sensuouslyexploring each other's bodies. Scalia devours Clark's pierced meat,then heads south to munch hungrily on his fuzzy pink pooper. Beforeyou know it, he's fiddling around with Clark's hole, which Clark seemsto enjoy immensely. title: Red Star
